removeACL

public void removeACL(java.lang.String path,
                      java.lang.String typeStr,
                      java.lang.String[] names)
               throws RNSError
Description copied from interface: RNSExtensionClient
Remove ACL entries. (Remove one type from ACL) 
 --- names of ACL entry type ---
 owner (or ou)
 ownergroup (or og)
 user (or u) (need names)
 group (or g) (need names)
 mask (or m)
 other (or o)
 default:owner (or d:ou)
 default:ownergroup (or d:og)
 default:user (or d:u) (need names)
 default:group (or d:g) (need names)
 default:mask (or d:m)
 default:other (or d:o)

Specified by:
removeACL in interface RNSExtensionClient
Parameters:
path - a pathname
typeStr - name of ACL entry type
names - remove names for user, group, default:user and default:group
Throws:
RNSError - if an error occurs

removeACL

                      short type,
                      java.lang.String[] names)
               throws RNSError

Specified by:
removeACL in interface RNSExtensionClient
Parameters:
path - a pathname
type - TYPE_* of ACL (See ACL)
names - remove names for user, group, default:user and default:group
